title: january 15: the curse of the great bambino
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the year that Babe Ruth took a huge pay cut, and then about his infamous curse. Afterwards, she talks about a recent musical release that made its way onto TV. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
